    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3

    ValueWithAttributes HotelPolicy

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3:HotelPolicy

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<HotelPolicy checkInTime="16:00:00" checkOutTime="12:00:00" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "HotelPolicy" : {
    "value" : null,
    "checkInTime" : "16:00:00",
    "checkOutTime" : "12:00:00"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        checkInTime
        The checkin time required by this hotel for a room stay.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:time
        Example Value 16:00:00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        checkOutTime
        The checkout time required by this hotel for a room stay.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:time
        Example Value 12:00:00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
